attributes.action: publicly reject the 9/11 Commision's final report and end our alliance with the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 9/11 Commmission Report did not properly consider the theories of controlled demolition etc. regarding the attacks. Becuase of this report many people have been killed through the War on Terror.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
